definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Out in the ocean any floating refuge can save the life of an exhausted bird.
sentences.chinese: 遼闊的大洋上任何浮物都能讓疲累得鳥兒憩息。

sentences.english: Who in your ocean finds her rest.
Write a book, cross the ocean, take a new job, change your pace. ------ William James.
sentences.chinese: 寫一本書，越過大洋，接受新工作，變換你的步調。

sentences.english: Voyager was heading for an ocean storm.
sentences.chinese: “航行者”號正駛向一個大洋風暴。

sentences.english: Albatrosses nesting in the Southern Ocean often undertake circumpolar trips between breeding seasons.
sentences.chinese: 信天翁在南大洋築巢往往繁殖季節之間進行極地考察。

sentences.english: Two-axis underwater channel often exists in deep ocean.
sentences.chinese: 雙軸聲道常出現於大洋中。

sentences.english: Existing beaked whale populations are found in nearly every ocean.
sentences.chinese: 在每個大洋幾乎都能見到突吻鯨的身影。

sentences.english: Oceanian Polynexiya had been shown specifically to cluster with Asia populations.
sentences.chinese: 大洋洲的波利尼西亞人與亞洲人羣聚在一起。

sentences.english: This mountain range runs north and south down the middle of the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 這座山運行範圍北和南大洋中的下降。

sentences.english: In the foreground are scenes visible over a rocky coastline toward the Southern Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 前景是一眼就能看見的南大洋布滿岩石羣的海岸線。

sentences.english: The ore district is located in the inside and outside contact strips of Dayang granite body.
sentences.chinese: 礦區處於大洋花崗岩體的內外接觸帶。

sentences.english: Also, it is the world's saltiest ocean.
sentences.chinese: 二是，這裏是世界上海水最鹹的大洋。

sentences.english: So my holiday began with driving on Great Ocean Road in the New Year.
sentences.chinese: 所以，在新的一年，我的假期從自駕大洋路開始。

sentences.english: Pugh is the only person to have completed a long distance swim in each of the five oceans of the world.
sentences.chinese: 普是全球惟一一位在五大洋中完成長距離游泳的人。

sentences.english: The world is made up of seven continents and four oceans.
sentences.chinese: 世界是由七大洲和四大洋組成的。

sentences.english: It might be something different, but, after all, I was born and raised on the other side of the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟我在大洋彼岸出生長大。

definition: East China Sea/East Sea (Chinese mythology and ancient geography)
